EmailTemplate.description: To be used for confirming M&V is complete from Customer Care end
EmailTemplate.name: Markit Hub Match and Validate
EmailTemplate.subject: Markit Hub Match and Validate
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi Team,
We have successfully matched and validated {!Case.ContactEmail__c} with the <research provider company name> profile via Markit Hub.
If you require any further assistance, please do not hesitate to contact us.
Kind regards, {!Case.OwnerFullName} IHS Markit | Customer Care
